title: 741: CATHIE WOOD’S $500K BITCOIN CALL IS ‘ALREADY HAPPENING’ - HOW TO RIDE THIS WAVE TO HALF A MILLION!!
description:
Cathie Wood isn’t afraid to make bold Bitcoin predictions. She told CNBC that BTC could soar to $500K in five years.

“If we’re right and companies continue to diversify their cash into something like Bitcoin, and institutional investors start allocating 5% of their funds in Bitcoin, we believe the price will be ten-fold what it is today. Instead of $45K, over $500K.”

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net

content:encoded:
Cathie Wood isn’t afraid to make bold Bitcoin predictions. She told CNBC that BTC could soar to $500K in five years. “If we’re right and companies continue to diversify their cash into something like Bitcoin, and institutional investors start allocating 5% of their funds in Bitcoin, we believe the price will be ten-fold what it is today. Instead of $45K, over $500K.” For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YT channel at: http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
